page.title: 12A MUSLIM GIRL IN SLOUGH
page.content:
If you come to Slough after living in Pakistan most of your life, it's a big step. One problem is that in Slough you can't read your daily prayer, because of going to work. Another is that Muslim girls are not allowed to wear skirts, but some schools make it compulsory.
The main problem is racialism, but not all people are racist. Some people joke about their colour. The thing I really dislike is when a person says another is dark in colour but afterwards says they would like to have a sun tan. Slough is a nice place to live in, if you've experienced a similar town in England. We have not come to England to take over, only to share it with English people. That's what people don't understand.
